[SYNTAX]: Occasionally complex, archaic sentence structures may impede smooth reading for modern audiences.

[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt transitions between historical, economic, and artistic tangents without clear thematic connections.
[LOGIC]: Ideas (e.g., Reynolds’ biography) feel disconnected from central Christmas theme.

[LEXICON]: Occasionally dense, poetic phrasing (e.g., "mysterious fastness of their hearts") may slightly impede smooth reading.

[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt, unexplained shift to discussing Bahá’u’lláh’s writings without clear connection to preceding scepticism-Christmas link.
